short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy & Paste LaTeX: Seamless formula transfer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy LaTeX from webpage and paste to anywhere 

How to use this product：
Hovering the mouse over a LaTeX mathematical expression will trigger the highlighting effect, and you can click to complete the copy operation.

Supports copying multiple lines, just use the shortcut key "shift + ↑" to turn on the Global Copy Mode, then select multiple lines and copy
